index_hero.title: your gateway for future
index_hero.desc: a world where value is created and exchanged by everyone in an efficient, open and secure manner

about_arabnetwork.title: What is Arab Network?
about_arabnetwork.desc: Arab Network is a community that doesn't have a central command. There is no single owner. Instead, a group of people shares their knowledge in blockchain technology, business, and education, working together to empower the Arab community in blockchain for a better future.

ecosystem.title: We are building a revolutionary ecosystem.
ecosystem.desc: We've got everything you need to start trading.

info.title: Arab Gate
info.desc: Arab Gate is a key component of future multichain protocols/applications, acting as a single point of access to various DeFi services across multiple blockchains. By having variations on the wallet, we have established a solid platform for expanding our product suite.
